module.name: Queues
module.description: Creates a queue where calls are placed on hold and answered on a first-in, first-out basis. Many options are available, including ring strategy for agents, caller announcements, max wait times, etc.
module.changelog: *2.11.0.5* mis-formed html *2.11.0.4* #6333, adds advanced settings for default starting Queue Event values. *2.11.0.3* add gotodest splicing label *2.11.0.2* remove some dialplan warnings *2.11.0.1* #4767, #6084, #5895, #6092 *2.11.0.0* #6051
